text: The 2019 Rhythmic Gymnastics Junior World Championships were the inaugural Rhythmic Gymnastics Junior World Championships. They were held in Moscow, Russia, from 19 July to 21 July 2019. Following the success of the event, which was measured by the amount of participating nations, The Executive Committee of the International Gymnastics Federation has announced the addition of the junior competitions to the official sporting calendar, which will take place every two years, in odd years. The next competition will be held in 2021. ==Participating nations== * (8) * (7) * (7) * (7) * (2) * (9) * (2) * (10) * (9) * (8) * (1) * (3) * (1) * (2) * (2) * (1) * (9) * (9) * (7) * (8) * (3) * (2) * (7) * (7) * (9) * (2) * (9) * (1) * (9) * (7) * (7) * (7) * (4) * (4) * (4) * (3) * (7) * (9) * (8) * (3) * (9) * (2) * (8) * (2) * (2) * (8) * (2) * (2) * (7) * (1) * ' (10) * (8) * (1) * (2) * (1) * (7) * (1) * (3) * (7) * (8) * (7) ==Medal winners== {| |- bgcolor="#DFDFDF" | colspan="4" align="center" | Team Competition |- !
